akn:content.akn:p: (1) the term “Commission” means the Commission on Civil Rights;
(2) the term “Secretary” means the Secretary of Health and Human Services;
(3) the term “Federal department or agency” means any agency as defined in section 551 of title 5 and includes the United States Postal Service and the Postal Regulatory Commission; and
(4) the term “program or activity” means all of the operations of— any part of which is extended Federal financial assistance.
